review_text:
So far great information and a lot to think about when presenting oneself and/or when doing it for others and/or helping someone else.

Update 1: This being the second survey on how things are with this course on "Writing Bios That Get Noticed", I must say that there is a lot of info that help and it is still a five stars from me. Would recommend it.

Update 2: great course. loved it.
